Our Services

Comprehensive solutions for the oil and gas industry

What We Offer

Comprehensive Services for the Oil & Gas Industry

At Ciscon, we provide a wide range of technical services and products to meet the needs of our clients in the petroleum industry.

Available Services

Geological Services

We provide comprehensive geological services including well site geology, mud logging, and geological consulting.

Learn More

Well Completion Services

Ciscon offers a complete array of Well Completion Services including intelligent Completion Designs, Equipment and Installation.

Learn More

Liner Hanger Services

Comprehensive liner hanger solutions including hydraulic and mechanical set designs, packer systems, and cementing tools.

Learn More

Tubular Services

Specialized tubular running and handling solutions with sizes from 1" to 36" OD, including advanced handling equipment.

Learn More

Slickline Services

Specialized deepwater slickline operations for well completion, maintenance, and intervention activities.

Learn More

Training Services

Professional development and leadership training programs designed to strengthen your organization from the top down.

Learn More
Featured Service

Geological Services

Our geological services are designed to provide comprehensive support for exploration and production activities in the oil and gas industry. With a team of experienced geologists and state-of-the-art equipment, we deliver accurate and timely geological data and analysis.

Well Site Geology

Real-time geological monitoring and analysis during drilling operations.

Mud Logging

Detailed analysis of drilling mud and cuttings to identify potential hydrocarbon reservoirs.

Geological Consulting

Expert advice on exploration strategies, reservoir characterization, and field development.

Learn More

The Ciscon Advantage

What sets our services apart from the competition

Experienced Team

Our team of professionals brings decades of industry experience to every project.

Quality Assurance

ISO 9001:2015 certified processes ensure consistent quality in all our services.

Advanced Technology

We utilize mordern technology and equipment for optimal results.

Local Knowledge

As an leading service company, we understand the uniqueness of our operating environments.

Customized Solutions

We tailor our services to meet the specific needs and challenges of each client.

Dedicated Support

Our responsive support team ensures your operations run smoothly 24/7.

What Our Clients Say

Hear from some of our satisfied clients about their experience with our services

John Adeyemi

Operations Manager, Shell Nigeria

The training services provided by Ciscon have significantly improved our team's technical capabilities. Their hands-on approach and industry-specific content made the training highly relevant and effective.

Sarah Okonkwo

Technical Director, Chevron Nigeria

Our Process

How We Work

Our structured approach ensures high-quality service delivery

1

Consultation

We begin by understanding your specific needs and challenges through a detailed consultation.

2

Assessment

Our experts assess your situation and develop a customized solution to address your requirements.

3

Implementation

We implement the solution with careful attention to quality, safety, and efficiency standards.

4

Follow-up

We provide ongoing support and follow-up to ensure your continued satisfaction and success.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Answers to common questions about our services

We primarily serve the oil and gas industry, including exploration, production, and processing sectors. Our services also extend to related industries such as mining and infrastructure development that require geological and engineering expertise.

Quality is at the core of everything we do. We maintain ISO 9001:2001 certification and implement rigorous quality management systems across all our services. Our team follows standardized procedures, conducts regular quality checks, and continuously improves our processes based on client feedback and industry best practices.

Yes, we pride ourselves on providing customized solutions tailored to each client's specific needs. During our initial consultation, we work closely with you to understand your unique challenges and requirements. Our experienced team then develops a personalized approach that addresses your particular situation, ensuring optimal results for your project.

Yes, we offer comprehensive training services for your staff as part of our service packages or as a standalone service. Our training programs can be conducted on-site or at our training facilities and are designed to enhance the technical skills and knowledge of your team. We believe in building local capacity and ensuring that your staff can effectively maintain and operate equipment and systems long after our direct involvement ends.

Requesting a quote is simple. You can contact us through our website's contact form, email us at info@cisconservices.com, or call our office directly at +234 805 664 8251. Please provide details about your project requirements, timeline, and any specific challenges you're facing. Our team will review your request and get back to you promptly with a customized quote.
